comments:
The following exception is occuring with the 
testOverwriteProjectExportSucceed()  test in ModuleExportOperationTestCase. This
looks to be an issue where an edit model is disposed by someone after it is be
accessed. This looks to be threading problem where edit models are not thread safe. 

Edit Model already disposed
